languages.text: "Ты говоришь о Теодоре так, что я начинаю подозревать влюбленность..."
"The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь о Теодоре так, что я начинаю подозревать влюбленность..."

traits.locale_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."
"The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."
"The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."
"The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

languages.text: “你谈论西奥多拉的方式，让我不禁在想，你是不是爱上了她……”
languages.original_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

traits.locale_text: “你谈论西奥多拉的方式，让我不禁在想，你是不是爱上了她……”

languages.text: «Por la forma en la que habla de Theodora, cabría pensar que estaba enamorado de ella...».
languages.original_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

traits.locale_text: «Por la forma en la que habla de Theodora, cabría pensar que estaba enamorado de ella...».

languages.text: 「シオドーラのことを話していると、お前は彼女を愛していたのではないかと思えてくるな…」
languages.original_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラのことを話していると、お前は彼女を愛していたのではないかと思えてくるな…」

languages.text: "Wenn ich Euch so über Theodora sprechen höre, glaube ich langsam, dass Ihr in sie verliebt wart ..."
languages.original_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich Euch so über Theodora sprechen höre, glaube ich langsam, dass Ihr in sie verliebt wart ..."

languages.text: « La façon dont vous parlez de Théodora me donne l'impression que vous l'aimiez... »
languages.original_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

traits.locale_text: « La façon dont vous parlez de Théodora me donne l'impression que vous l'aimiez... »

languages.text: "Theodora hakkında öyle konuşuyorsun ki ona âşık olduğunu düşüneceğim..."
languages.original_text: "The way you talk about Theodora, I'm beginning to think you were in love with her..."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora hakkında öyle konuşuyorsun ki ona aşık olduğunu düşüneceğim..."
